channel.title: NPMK Podcast
channel.description: This site contains information about the North Penn High School Marching Knights.
channel.itunes:author: Bryan Clayton
channel.itunes:subtitle: This site contains information about the North Penn High School Marching Knights.
channel.itunes:summary: This site contains information about the North Penn High School Marching Knights.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: The 2007 North Penn Marching Knights are happy that you have joined their podcasting comunity. Check here ofter for information about the Marching Knights show, schedule, scores and other information
